players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I am Diana, the detective. I investigated Bob last night and found out he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "Bob, can you respond to Diana's claim? It's important we clarify this before voting."
You: "I confirm that I am the mafioso. My actions are in line with my role. We must ensure the town's survival, and removing me would jeopardize our chances of winning."
Charlie: "I don't trust Bob's confession; a mafioso wouldn't admit their role so openly. Diana, can you share any proof from your investigation to back your claim?"

Diana: "I understand Charlie's skepticism, but as the detective, I only get one chance to investigate each night. I am certain Bob is the mafioso. His silence and now his strange confession confirm his guilt. We must vote him out."
